ğŸ¯ Primary Use Case: Converting ebooks to audiobooks
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Generates .m4b audiobooks from .epub ebooks using Kokoro's text-to-speech model â€¢ Supports multiple languages (ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡· ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³) â€¢ Offers both command-line and GUI interfaces â€¢ Provides CUDA support for GPU acceleration â€¢ Allows adjusting audio speed (0.5x to 2.0x)
ğŸ“– Summary: Audiblez converts ebooks (.epub) into audiobooks (.m4b) using Kokoro's text-to-speech model. It offers command-line and GUI interfaces, supports multiple languages and CUDA acceleration, and allows for speed adjustment. The process involves generating individual chapter WAV files and then combining them into a final M4B file using ffmpeg.
